# ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES
# REFACTORING:
# WHAT CAN BE A BUILDTIME VARIABLE?
# WHAT CAN BE A RUNTIME VARIABLE?
# WHAT CAN BE A NEXT_PUBLIC VARIABLE?
# WHAT MUST BELONG IN A SECRET STORE?
# WHAT MUST BELONG IN .ENV FILE?
# WHAT MUST BELONG IN .ENV.PRODUCTION FILE?

NODE_ENV=development # BUILD VAR IN ALL PACKAGES,   PROVIDED IN BUILD SCRIPT
NEXT_PUBLIC_IS_LOCAL_BUILD=1 # BUILD VAR IN NEXTJS, PROVIDED IN BUILD SCRIPT
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_DOMAIN="localhost" # BUILD VAR IN SUPERTOKENS CONFIG, PROVIDE IN DOCKERFILE

# SHOP
NEXT_PUBLIC_SHOP_APP_URL=http://localhost:$SHOP_APP_PORT # BUILDTIME VAR, USED IN CORE-LIB FUNCTIONS AND SUPERTOKENS CONFIG, PROVIDED IN ENV, AND DOCKERFILE
NEXT_PUBLIC_SHOP_APP_CHECKOUT_SUCCESS_URL=http://localhost:$SHOP_APP_PORT/checkout/success # BUILD VAR IN PAYMENTS SERVER, PROVIDED IN ENV AND DOCKERFILE
SKIP_BUILD_STATIC_GENERATION=1 RUNTIME VAR, USED IN NEXTJS DEVELOPMENT BUILD

# DASHBOARD
NEXT_PUBLIC_DASHBOARD_APP_URL=http://localhost:$DASHBOARD_APP_PORT # BUILDTIME VAR, USED IN CORE-LIB FUNCTIONS AND SUPERTOKENS CONFIG, PROVIDED IN ENV, AND DOCKERFILE

# BACKEND
BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_MAIN_PORT # RUNTIME VAR, PROVIDED IN NEXT.CONFIG.JS, AND DOCKERFILE
SERVER_PORT         BUILDTIME VAR, PROVIDED IN DOCKERFILE BUILD ARG
SERVER_MAIN_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_MAIN_PORT
NEXT_PUBLIC_SERVER_MAIN_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_MAIN_PORT
SERVER_LOCATION_PORT=6011
SERVER_LOCATION_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_LOCATION_PORT
NEXT_PUBLIC_SERVER_LOCATION_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_LOCATION_PORT

SERVER_PAYMENTS_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_PAYMENTS_PORT
NEXT_PUBLIC_SERVER_PAYMENTS_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_PAYMENTS_PORT
SERVER_IMAGE_PORT=6031
SERVER_IMAGE_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_IMAGE_PORT
NEXT_PUBLIC_SERVER_IMAGE_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_IMAGE_PORT
SERVER_DISPATCH_PORT=6041
SERVER_DISPATCH_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_DISPATCH_PORT
NEXT_PUBLIC_SERVER_DISPATCH_URL=http://localhost:$SERVER_DISPATCH_PORT
